@description.name: @description
@description.body: This mixin is included by all widgets which supports native overflowing.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Gets the (computed) value of the property overflowX. For further details take a look at the property definition: {@link #overflowX}.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Sets the user value of the property overflowX. For further details take a look at the property definition: {@link #overflowX}.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Resets the user value of the property overflowX. The computed value falls back to the next available value e.g. appearance, init or inheritance value depending on the property configuration and value availability. For further details take a look at the property definition: {@link #overflowX}.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Gets the (computed) value of the property overflowY. For further details take a look at the property definition: {@link #overflowY}.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Sets the user value of the property overflowY. For further details take a look at the property definition: {@link #overflowY}.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Resets the user value of the property overflowY. The computed value falls back to the next available value e.g. appearance, init or inheritance value depending on the property configuration and value availability. For further details take a look at the property definition: {@link #overflowY}.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Gets the (computed) value of the property overflow. For further details take a look at the property definition: {@link #overflow}.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Sets the user value of the property overflow. For further details take a look at the property definition: {@link #overflow}.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Resets the user value of the property overflow. The computed value falls back to the next available value e.g. appearance, init or inheritance value depending on the property configuration and value availability. For further details take a look at the property definition: {@link #overflow}.
